content: processes you have instant access to the pattern you are only receiving access to a pdf you will not receive a physical pattern via snail mail and you will not receive an email with the pdf you will need to go to your library and download the pdf yourself digital purchases are final sale - due to their digital nature they cannot be returned or refunded **copyright 2025** - all eyeloveknots patterns photos and pdf s are protected under copyright they are not to be copied distributed or sold - doing so is copyright infringement and stealing do not link to the pdf download link rather linking should be done from blog post or shop link feel free to use this information to make and sell your own items designer credit - alexandra of eyeloveknots com - is very much appreciated but not required do not use my photos in selling your own products 1 https //eyeloveknots com/2025/08/crochet-sampler-blanket-free-pattern html 2 https //yarncraftsandcoffee com/classes-events/ 3 https //yarn-crafts-coffee myflodesk com/fmpwy17v72 4 https //youtu be/2woqpisqmvu 5 https //youtu be/486eexoh85g 6 https //youtu be/-4fkm56yrfe 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/volume-one-afghan-square 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/volume-one-hand-towel 9 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/volume-one-rectangle-shawl 10 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/through-the-window-afghan 11 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/gia-afghan 12 https //youtu be/fqn8ytvomy4 13 https //eyeloveknots com 14 https //yarncraftsandcoffee com 15 https //cre8tioncrochet com
